name: MobLike Prototype
description:
Collect upgrades and Shoot your way through an endless Dungeon.
How far can you go?


Controls

Move: WASD + Mouse + Space
Dash: Shift (up to 2 charges are stored)
Shoot: Left Mouse
Multi-Shot: Right Mouse (stores multiple charges, can be upgraded)


How to play:

Fight your way to the exit of each level.
Aim for the head to inflict maximum damage.
Defeating an enemy with an headshot increases your attack speed for a limited time.

Upgrades

Increases the damage of your attacks by 5%.
Increases attack speed by 5%.
Increase the number of shots fired by 1.
Reduces the cooldown for secondary attacks by 5%.
Increases the maximum number of stored secondary attack by 1.

More about the game

I was unable to add much content inside the Jams timeframe.
So there are not many different enemies, only 1 weapon and 1 boss.
I still hope you have some minutes of fun, shooting your way through the dungeon.
